nodes.text: Meeting The Dark Lord is a short story that was published in Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back. It was also included in The Movie Trilogy Sourcebook.

Informed that Darth Vader was arriving at Cloud City, Baron Admistrator Lando Calrissian set out to meet him. Calrissian tried to use his swagger, but was rebuffed, and Vader then set the terms of the deal.
The story was revised slightly for the second edition release of Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back and renamed to "Meeting a Dark Lord".
